channel.title: Black Mesa Minecraft Server
channel.description:
First up, this thread is in this section to keep the server kinda private rather than it being completely public.
[align=center][img]https://cazzaserver.com/bmmc/bmmc.png[/img]
[b]SERVER IS CURRENTLY:[/b][/SIZE] [url=https://minecraftservers.net/comment.php?id=50][img]https://minecraftservers.net/statimg.php?id=50&theme=1[/img][/url][/align]
[b]ABOUT THE SERVER[/b][/SIZE] For those who don't know, I run a Minecraft server for the Black Mesa community. There are probably around 10 active players and we get up to some pretty awesome stuff. For a (fairly old) overview of some of the stuff we get up to [url=https://cazzaserver.com/2010/11/our-minecraft-server/]click here[/url], I should probably post an update soon.
[b]PICS[/b][/SIZE] [url=https://cazzaserver.com/2010/11/our-minecraft-server/2010-11-28_23-17-25/][img]https://cazzaserver.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/2010-11-28_23.17.25-150x150.png[/img][/url] [url=https://cazzaserver.com/2010/11/our-minecraft-server/2010-11-28_22-58-27/][img]https://cazzaserver.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/2010-11-28_22.58.27-150x150.png[/img][/url] [url=https://cazzaserver.com/2010/11/our-minecraft-server/2010-11-28_23-00-13/][img]https://cazzaserver.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/2010-11-28_23.00.13-150x150.png[/img][/url] [url=https://cazzaserver.com/2010/11/our-minecraft-server/2010-11-28_23-00-43/][img]https://cazzaserver.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/2010-11-28_23.00.43-150x150.png[/img][/url] [url=https://cazzaserver.com/2010/11/our-minecraft-server/2010-11-28_23-00-55/][img]https://cazzaserver.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/2010-11-28_23.00.55-150x150.png[/img][/url] [url=https://cazzaserver.com/2010/11/our-minecraft-server/2010-11-28_23-09-14/][img]https://cazzaserver.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/2010-11-28_23.09.14-150x150.png[/img][/url] [url=https://cazzaserver.com/2010/11/our-minecraft-server/2010-11-28_23-55-32/][img]https://cazzaserver.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/2010-11-28_23.55.32-150x150.png[/img][/url] [url=https://cazzaserver.com/2010/11/our-minecraft-server/2010-11-28_23-54-30/][img]https://cazzaserver.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/2010-11-28_23.54.30-150x150.png[/img][/url]
[b]HOW DO I ACCESS THE SERVER?[/b][/SIZE] Currently the address is only really given out to people who ask (And usually who are in the BM Steam chat too), but since our current server is failing us we have decided to no longer give out the address until we get the new server.

item.description:
So his family eats cardboard for a week. Big deal.

item.title: Black Mesa Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
SassyRobot:

It was a joke. Either way he shouldn’t be paying to play with people who are being dickheads about it.

What i’m using is money that wouldn’t be used otherwise, so it’s really not that big of a deal.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
Isn’t that exactly what he didn’t want to post because the volume of people would destroy the current server?

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
What?
If we get the new server the IP will go public and anyone can join the server and it will be a very easy process to be get build access too. Anyone who donates now get access to the current server.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
I am donating about 70 NOK(dunno what it is in dollars, and i dont have a converter on my ipod). Its not much, but it’s something

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
SassyRobot:

Jerry, how did you manage to buy the game in the first place? I thought you had to do it through paypal.

My dad agreed to buy it for me. I don’t think he will donate too, but i can ask him.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
The ones I buy are grey. I’ll try to find those yellow ones, that could save me quite some time.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
Imonfire:

Except it doesn’t work anymore. I tried it.

But yeah just transfer funds from your bank account. It usually takes about 8 business days for the transfer to complete, but it’s better than nothing. Unless they accept non-instant payments.

You’re buying the wrong type of Visa gift card, then. You have to make sure you get the yellow packaged one. Then you can attach a billing address and name to it. I use that method to buy everything online because I have to credit card and my debit card usually has no money on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
Nope, now you can do it via bank transfer.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
Winged One:

  1. Buy a Visa Gift Card with paper money.

  2. Register that card on Gift2Go.net.

  3. Enter your gift card as your credit/debit card on PayPal.

  4. ???

  5. PROFIT

Except it doesn’t work anymore. I tried it.

But yeah just transfer funds from your bank account. It usually takes about 8 business days for the transfer to complete, but it’s better than nothing. Unless they accept non-instant payments.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Just send me the money by mail. I’ll make sure it gets where it needs to go.

Read full topic
